name: HooverCook
0:
”Alexa, open Hoover Cook”
”Alexa, start Hoover Cook”
”Alexa, launch Hoover Cook”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hoover cook
des:
Enter a new world, manage your Hoover appliance in a performing and healthy way. You can find the best function to cook your dishes and get support on how to keep your oven in excellent condition. 
To use the full features set of Hoover you must have purchased a Hoover's oven and have created an account using the Hoover Wizard.

About this skill:
The skill supports the features available in the Wizard App. Be aware that since home appliance is not part of the Alexa Smart Home program, you’ll need to use “Hoover Cook” as an Invocation Name to activate the skill. It means “Alexa open Hoover Cook…” or “Alexa ask Hoover Cook…”
This skill can be used only with compatible ovens (check the compatibility of your appliance on http://go.candy-group.com/hoover-ov )

To get started:
Register your smart appliance using the Wizard App on your iOS or Android device.
In the App
Tapping on the icon with the four squares at the bottom left, you will find the "User Manual" section to download the guide to register the appliance to Alexa.
If you’re not familiar with the skill, simply start off by saying: 
“Alexa, ask Hoover Cook what can I ask you” or “Alexa, open Hoover Cook”, wait for the answer and then ask “what can I do?” 

You can do many things like:
Discover how to prepare your dishes better.
Try saying: "Alexa, ask Hoover Cook how do I cook cookies" otherwise “Alexa, open Hoover Cook”, wait for the answer and then ask “how do I prepare crispy chicken?”

Know what a specific function consists of.
Ask to Alexa: "Alexa, ask Hoover Cook what the Defrost function is" or "Alexa, launch Hoover Cook”, wait for the answer and then ask “what does the Softcook function do?"

Take care about your oven.
Try saying: "Alexa, ask Hoover Cook how do I clean the oven" or "Alexa, open Hoover Cook”, wait for the answer and then ask “how do I remove bad smells?”

Contacts
If you have any questions please contact Hoover Support: https://service.hoover.co.uk/
